name: HamQuest
description:
(Requires Silverlight. Yeah... I know.)

A Casual Roguelike.

Arrow keys to move, attack, open doors, pick up items, etc.

Food and Potions auto-consumed.

changes between Offensive and Defensive configurations(only matters if you have a 2H Sword and a Shield)

Y to invoke the amulet of Yendor (once you get it).
